page.title: 14MEDIA IN HASTINGS
page.content: Every Thursday "The Hastings and St. Leonards Observer" is published and most people in the town read it. It's front page will have the most recent local story and will reflect local attitudes and social concerns. The political and economical events and customs of the town may be featured. Other local interests are mentioned. Entertainment has two pages. So do local sports clubs. Several pages have adverts of housing for sale. There is always a list of personal announcements such as births, marriages and deaths. Local news is also featured on the local television station.
